author: Suresh Raina

quote: FIFA stands for discipline, respect, fair-play, not just on the field of play, but in our society as well.
author: Sepp Blatter

quote: I'm not cocky at all. You ask anybody, I'm one of the nicest guys. I try to be as humble as I can, but if you work hard, sometimes you know that you earned more respect.
author: Shabazz Muhammad

quote: What I have known with respect to myself, has tended much to lessen both my admiration, and my contempt, of others.
author: Joseph Priestley

quote: We do not covet anything from any nation except their respect.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: If being an egomaniac means I believe in what I do and in my art or music, then in that respect you can call me that... I believe in what I do, and I'll say it.
author: John Lennon

quote: I will not speak with disrespect of the Republican Party. I always speak with respect of the past.
author: Woodrow Wilson

quote: I have great respect for the religion. I know a lot of people that are Muslim and are phenomenal people.
author: Colin Kaepernick

quote: I don't have to participate in another culture's ceremonies in order to respect that culture.
author: Sherman Alexie

quote: Russians aren't perfect. Their politics are messed up, and they keep going through self-defeating economic cycles. But I have a lot of respect for Russia, and a lot of love for Russians.
author: Chris Hadfield

quote: Building a professional relationship on respect as opposed to affection is a very good idea. Running your art projects the way you'd run a dry-cleaning business is also a really good idea. You shouldn't go into work like you're going on a date, like you're hanging out with friends.
author: Penn Jillette

quote: I love Damien Hirst. I respect his work a great deal, and I am happy that the polka dots I started using have become a symbol of love and peace around the world with everybody joining hands to use them in this way.
author: Yayoi Kusama

quote: Golf is game of respect and sportsmanship; we have to respect its traditions and its rules.
author: Jack Nicklaus

quote: Honoring the priesthood fosters respect, respect promotes reverence, and reverence invites revelation.
author: Russell M. Nelson

quote: Thus, it was to seek true civilization and true justice for all the peoples of the world, and to view this as the destruction of personal freedom and respect is to be assailed by the hatred and emotion of war, and to make hasty judgments.
author: Hideki Tojo

quote: I have total respect for anyone who discovers a band like Snow Patrol. I would be hopeless at signing a rock band, or anything alternative, cause I don't know what that audience are into and I don't particularly like that kind of music.
author: Simon Cowell

quote: A lot of the time, the way it's portrayed is that I only see women in a sexual way. But I grew up with just my mum and sister, so I respect women a lot.
author: Harry Styles

quote: When you are learning about a martial art, it is about respect.
author: Jackie Chan

quote: I respect the fact that people have worked hard all week and want to go to the movies on the weekend and be entertained.
author: Michael Moore

quote: I don't care why they love me, as long as they love me. I think people respect me because they feel like - I'm kind of like Christmas. I come back every year. You can't get rid of me. I just keep coming back.
author: David Hasselhoff

quote: You can be cool and at the same time respect your woman, who will hopefully become your wife, who will hopefully become the mother of your kids. America needs to get back to family values.
author: Martin Lawrence

quote: I've always had the greatest respect for and listened to both my father and my mother. I've always tried to follow my parents' advice because these are people who want the best for me.
author: Neymar

quote: Respect is the word I want. You have to earn it. You give, and you get it in return, that's how I see it.
author: Joe Torre

quote: There is respect for law, and then there is complicity in lawlessness.
author: Rebecca MacKinnon

quote: I have nothing against Dylan O'Brien! He's one of my favorite people. I have so much respect for him and his work.
author: Katherine McNamara

quote: I think that in any language when you have a real relationship, and there is love and respect between people, infidelity is always something difficult to accept - whether you are Chinese, British, French. I think that is a universal concept... or problem.
author: Jean-Michel Jarre

quote: There's a part of martial arts where we need humility and respect.
author: Eddie Alvarez

quote: I am personally not against keeping animals at zoos, as they serve a huge educational purpose, but treating them well and with respect seems the least we could do, and with 'we' I mean not just zoo staff, but most certainly also the public.
author: Frans de Waal

quote: I received from my experience in Japan an incredible sense of respect for the art of creating, not just the creative product. We're all about the product. To me, the process was also an incredibly important aspect of the total form.
author: Julie Taymor

quote: I've the highest respect and regards for Shankar sir. He has taken Tamil cinema to a new level. I would have loved to work with him, but there are some date hassles.
author: Vijay

quote: Civility is not about dousing strongly held views. It's about making sure that people are willing to respect other perspectives.
author: Jim Leach

quote: Flame mails and offensive Internet activities are not classy. It doesn't fit with our culture here, where we respect the gender, race, opinions, ear-lobe apparel and choice of clothing of all employees.
author: David Duffield

quote: I certainly respect privacy and privacy rights. But on the other hand, the first function of government is to guarantee the security of all the people.
author: Phil Crane

quote: The fact that the adult American Negro female emerges a formidable character is often met with amazement, distaste and even belligerance. It is seldom accepted as an inevitable outcome of the struggle won by survivors, and deserves respect if not enthusiastic acceptance.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: We are more thoroughly an enlightened people, with respect to our political interests, than perhaps any other under heaven. Every man among us reads, and is so easy in his circumstances as to have leisure for conversations of improvement and for acquiring information.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: With all due respect, the Mona Lisa is overrated.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: The respect and protection of woman and of maternity should be raised to the position of an inalienable social duty and should become one of the principles of human morality.
author: Maria Montessori

quote: There are people who drove me crazy, but they got the job done. And when I see that person again, I nod my head. Respect.
author: Bill Murray

quote: I shall not remind you, Citizen-Directors, of all I have done for the triumph of liberty, the prosperity of St. Domingo, the glory of the French Republic; nor will I protest to you my attachment to our mother country, to my duties; my respect to the constitution, to the laws of the Republic, and my submission to the government.
author: Toussaint Louverture

quote: I used to get nervous, you know if my parents would come watch. And then I would get nervous if my friends came and watched. Today it's not a problem anymore actually, because now I enjoy it. author: Roger Federer

quote: The highest ideals are human intelligence, creativity and love. Respect these above all.
author: Penn Jillette

quote: Democracy without respect for individual rights sucks. It's just ganging up against the weird kid, and I'm always the weird kid.
author: Penn Jillette

quote: If your religion doesn't respect the rights of other religions, it is lacking something.
author: Roger Ebert

quote: I have nothing but respect for the Lakers. So many of their legends shaped who I am as a person and player.
author: Bill Walton

author: Shimon Peres

author: Branch Rickey

quote: I like guitar. It just turned out that it's the instrument I learned to play. I have a lot of respect for it, and I'm learning more and more every day. For me, the classic band setup - guitars, drums, bass - will stay fresh forever. I don't know. I'm still into it.
author: Mac DeMarco

quote: When you get close to the raw materials and taste them at the moment they let go of the soil, you learn to respect them.
author: Rene Redzepi

quote: My parents loved each other. I was raised in a house of total love and respect. My dad worked very hard and my mother was incredibly devoted to him. I can unequivocally, without any peradventure of doubt, tell you that I was raised with the kind of love that we only dream of.
author: James Woods

quote: Obedience is a strong virtue, capable of making me master of my emotions by giving me more strength to conquer my pride as I submit to those above me out of respect for their God-given authority and those below me out of love.

quote: This is the final test of a gentleman: his respect for those who can be of no possible service to him.
author: William Lyon Phelps

quote: The new republic should be based on diversity, respect and equal rights for all.
author: Evo Morales

quote: Free trade is very important if we respect equality among nations.

quote: Apart from being celebrities, there's a huge amount of respect associated with being cricketers and a certain amount of reverence and honour associated with representing India. author: Rahul Dravid

quote: I'm not a trash talker. I respect my opponents.
author: Rafael dos Anjos

quote: I don't do resolutions, as I am a rebel without a cause in that respect - I always break them by the second of Jan.!
author: Katherine Kelly

quote: The E.U. is more than just a trade organization or a common market; it is a guarantee of democracy, freedom, justice, and human rights. Nations cannot stay in the E.U. if they do not respect these guarantees.
author: John Bruton

I can respect bad acting that owns its own style.
author: James Wolcott

quote: I take risks, but I don't lose respect for my real self. Because what's going to happen afterwards? How are you going to get back? Is there going to be a train, or will it be after midnight and you can't go home again?
author: Isabelle Adjani

quote: We will be safer from terrorist attack only when we have earned the respect of all other nations instead of their fear, respect for our values and not merely our weapons.
author: Theodore C. Sorensen

quote: Not just Christians and Jews, but also Muslims, Buddhists, Hindus and the followers of many other religions believe in values like peace, respect, tolerance and dignity. These are values that bring people together and enable us to build responsible and solid communities.

quote: I have the profoundest respect for people who behave in a generous way because of religion. But I come from a country where the misuse of religion has had catastrophic consequences. One must judge people not by what faith they proclaim but by what they do.

quote: Whatever woman I love... I gotta love her. She might be a hood rat, but she's gotta have respect for my mother.

quote: I believe that young people are looking for answers to the big questions just like everyone else, and that they respect intelligent comment to help guide them through tough times.
author: Bill Kurtis

author: Christopher Wren

author: Byron Katie

author: Scott Wilson

author: John Lindsay

quote: Go up close to your friend, but do not go over to him! We should also respect the enemy in our friend.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Consult your friend on all things, especially on those which respect yourself. His counsel may then be useful where your own self-love might impair your judgment.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: We should all consider each other as human beings, and we should respect each other.
author: Malala Yousafzai

quote: Hip-hop is more about attaining wealth. People respect success. They respect big. They don't even have to like your music. If you're big enough, people are drawn to you.
author: Jay-Z

quote: I hate victims who respect their executioners.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: It's like a jar of salad dressing sitting on a shelf... most of the seasoning settles to the bottom of the bottle. In the same way, we can stir ourselves up and regain the reverence, respect and awe we once had for the Lord.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: All morality consists in a system of rules, and the essence of all morality is to be sought for in the respect which the individual acquires for these rules.
author: Jean Piaget

quote: I don't know where people think I'm from, but I'm from Chicago. It's really just that. author: Chance The Rapper

quote: I respect Apple. It's a great company that changed the world, especially the mobile time.
author: Jack Ma

author: Bette Davis

quote: New York gave me hell for that 'Purple Swag,' man. They didn't respect me until 'Peso.'

author: Bill Burr

quote: Much respect to Eminem - he's the greatest.
author: G-Eazy

quote: If a person studies too much and exhausts his reflective powers, he will be confused, and will not be able to apprehend even that which had been within the power of his apprehension. For the powers of the body are all alike in this respect.
author: Maimonides

quote: I'm blessed enough to been in the game for a while and still have my beautiful fans and still have the respect. That's something that gets me going. I'm also fortunate enough to take vacation and take a little hiatus.

quote: I have a lot of respect for Martin Luther King. I think he was one of the greatest orators that the country ever produced.
author: Fred Hampton

quote: Our work for human dignity is often lonely, and almost always an uphill climb. At times, our efforts are misunderstood, and we are mistaken for the enemy. There has been a clear erosion of respect for U.N. blue and our impartiality.
author: Ban Ki-moon

quote: Certainly we have made mistakes, but you try and learn from your mistakes. And the most important thing is always to move forward and, I think, empower people to do their best, and to lead. I think people respect that and work better under those circumstances.
author: Anna Wintour

author: David Suzuki

quote: If anyone asks for your autograph they're showing you respect and give it back to them.
author: John Lydon

quote: The people I respect the least are the ones that take themselves way too seriously.
author: Corey Taylor

quote: My wife totally backs the way I am on stage; that's one of the amazing things about her. I have 120 per cent respect for her when I'm on stage, so there are definitely certain things I would never do.

quote: I see the entire world as Eden, and every time you take an inch of it away, you must do so with respect.
author: Joni Mitchell

quote: The Apology opened the opportunity for a new relationship based on mutual respect and mutual responsibility between Indigenous and non-Indigenous Australia. Because without mutual respect and mutual responsibility, the truth is we can achieve very little.
author: Kevin Rudd

quote: I totally respect the pope, and I totally respect the Catholic bishops and cardinals on doctrine.
author: Stephen Bannon

quote: Simple ingredients, treated with respect... put them together and you will always have a great dish.
author: Jose Andres

author: Betsy DeVos

quote: I'm an atheist, but I'm very relaxed about it. I don't preach my atheism, but I have a huge amount of respect for people like Richard Dawkins who do.
author: Daniel Radcliffe

quote: I like to be bought flowers and taken out for dinner. I like a man to be a gentleman. I don't like to be treated as if I am brainless. I like to be respected and to give respect.

quote: I have learned to respect ideas, wherever they come from. Often they come from clients. Account executives often have big creative ideas, regardless of what some writers think.

quote: I think it's time that we all be there for the children, to learn from the ones who came before us, and to teach our sons and daughters to have respect for themselves. Break the cycle.

quote: Before you, I engage myself to serve my country with the devotion and the exemplary that this post demands. I understand responsibilities of the job and, as such, I give a republican salute to Nicolas Sarkozy who has led France for 5 years and who deserves all of our respect.
author: Francois Hollande

quote: There is a secret pride in every human heart that revolts at tyranny. You may order and drive an individual, but you cannot make him respect you.
author: William Hazlitt

quote: My stories are about humans and how they react, or fail to react, or react stupidly. I'm pointing the finger at us, not at the zombies. I try to respect and sympathize with the zombies as much as possible.
author: George A. Romero

quote: I guess at the end of the day, all women like to be appreciated and treated with respect and kindness.
author: Sofia Vergara

quote: As an overruling providence may succeed our wishes, let us rear an offspring in every respect worthy to fill the most illustrious stations of their predecessors.
author: Deborah Sampson

quote: Mankind's true moral test, its fundamental test (which lies deeply buried from view), consists of its attitude towards those who are at its mercy: animals. And in this respect mankind has suffered a fundamental debacle, a debacle so fundamental that all others stem from it.
author: Milan Kundera

quote: When you program a robot to be intelligent, you learn a number of things. You become very humble and develop enormous respect for natural intelligence because, even if you work day and night for several years, your robot isn't that smart after all.
author: Sebastian Thrun

quote: A student never forgets an encouraging private word, when it is given with sincere respect and admiration.
author: William Lyon Phelps

quote: There are so many things to think about when you make an album. Like, who am I trying to impress? Am I going to get respect, critical acclaim? Or am I going to sell lots of records?
author: Ellie Goulding

quote: I think of marriage as a garden. You have to tend to it. Respect it, take care of it, feed it. Make sure everyone is getting the right amount of, um, sunlight.

quote: I respect everyone, from the homeless brother and sister on the street to the executive that sits in the highest office named President Barack Obama. I respect everyone - but we over-respect no one.

quote: If you're earning equal pay to a man, you get respect. It shouldn't be that way, but it is.
author: Diana Rigg

quote: The difference must be distinguished between worship and respect. Islam orders you to obey and respect, as long as you are not worshiping anything other than God... Islam is a religion of peace. You don't attack. You explain.
author: Hakeem Olajuwon

quote: The only situation that I can't be in favour of is the lack of respect to human rights in Venezuela.
author: Mauricio Macri

quote: I leave CNN with the utmost respect, love and admiration for the company and everyone who works here. This has been my family and shared endeavor for the past 27 years, and I am forever grateful and proud of all that we have accomplished.
author: Christiane Amanpour

quote: As far as military necessity will permit, religiously respect the constitutional rights of all.
author: George B. McClellan

quote: I fear God and respect God and love God.
author: Brett Ratner

quote: Teachers make a difference in individual students' lives, yet they do not get the respect they deserve.
author: Randi Weingarten

quote: I'm not saying abolish group work - I think there's a time and a place for people to come together and exchange ideas, but let's restore the respect we once had for solitude. And we need to be much more mindful of the way we come together.

quote: As far as more recognition goes, I am happy with the amount of love and respect I have received from other artists and the public. Of course, I would love more, and think I deserve it.

quote: Collaboration is just, really, a group of people getting in a room with their eye on a very similar prize and wanting to come out with the same show. author: Harold Prince

quote: We can win respect in the world only if we are strong internally and can banish poverty and unemployment from our country.
author: Lal Bahadur Shastri

quote: We were united not only by political respect for each other, but also by deep mutual sympathy as people.
author: Helmut Kohl

quote: A lot of my friends are gangsters. Not like gangsters - well, yeah, all sorts of levels of criminality - but not the types that are preying on innocent people. I have no interest in the type of criminality that has no respect for collateral damage.
author: Charlie Hunnam

quote: The Obama administration now has regulations that tells them that they can no longer promote marriage to these young girls. They can no longer promote marriage as a way of avoiding poverty and bad choices that they make in their life. They can no longer even teach abstinence education. They have to be neutral with respect to how people behave.
author: Rick Santorum

quote: We are at a point now where people respect us and respect our work - the guys want to sit down and watch women's matches.
author: Sasha Banks

quote: Being a parent is not just about how you treat your child; it's also about how you treat the other parent. If you treat that person with respect, that's fine, that's the way to go. But if you don't, you're not being the parent you could be.
author: Art Alexakis

quote: On one side, citizens have great respect for the United States; they have a great feeling of friendship. That is solid. But in the opposition and in the political arena I often find criticism of the closeness of relations with the United States. That is a reality.
author: Vicente Fox

quote: People always have an opinion. Doesn't mean it's right, doesn't mean it's wrong, but we have to respect their opinion.
author: Michael Clarke Duncan

quote: There is in us a lyric germ or nucleus which deserves respect; it bids a man to ponder or create; and in this dim corner of himself he can take refuge and find consolations which the society of his fellow creatures does not provide.
author: Norman Douglas

quote: For me, public service is an honor, and I have the ultimate respect for the rule of law.

quote: Respect goes a long way when you carry yourself a certain way and show manners when you first meet someone. If you do that, then it's hard for somebody not to like you.

quote: The valor and courage of our young women and men in the armed services are a shining example to all of the world, and we owe them and their families our deepest respect.

quote: Always look for the best ingredients, treat the food you cook with respect, always read the entire recipe first, be organized, and have fun.
author: April Bloomfield

quote: In the military I could exercise the power of being automatically respected because of the medals on my chest, not because I had done anything right at the moment to earn that respect. This is pretty nice. It's also a psychological trap that can stop one's growth and allow one to get away with just plain bad behavior.
author: Karl Marlantes

quote: He has a profound respect for old age. Especially when it's bottled.
author: Gene Fowler

quote: I started to respect older actors when I was young and then contemporary actors later on. Then I learned respect for comedy. author: Anne Meara

quote: I have so much respect for people who do blue-collar work because I come from that background myself.
author: Cynthia Kadohata

quote: Only with the honour thus acquired can we earn the respect of our other compatriots as well.
author: Janos Kadar

quote: A human society obeys the dictates of reason and is guided and governed by a respect for justice.
author: Ferdinand Buisson

quote: I don't believe in very many things, but art is definitely one of them. And at the top of that list, film and art influence our world's culture much more than many of us understand and fully respect.
author: Megan Ellison

quote: And Barack and I were raised with so many of the same values, like you work hard for what you want in life. That your word is your bond; that you do what you say you're going to do. author: Michelle Obama

quote: I do get recognized, but I must say Edinburgh is a fantastic city to live if you're well-known. There is an innate respect for privacy in Edinburgh people, and I also think they're used to seeing me walking around, so I don't think I'm a very big deal.

quote: 'God' is a relative word and has a respect to servants, and 'Deity' is the dominion of God, not over his own body, as those imagine who fancy God to be the soul of the world, but over servants.

quote: I think I have a certain respect for people, you know. And I guess a lot of times I expect that respect to go both ways.
author: Tom Brady

quote: Against my will, in the course of my travels, the belief that everything worth knowing was known at Cambridge gradually wore off. In this respect my travels were very useful to me.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Peace can be contributed to by respect for our ability in defense.
author: Herbert Hoover

quote: Respect the masterpiece. It is true reverence to man. There is no quality so great, none so much needed now.
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: I think the short story is a very underrated art form. We know that novels deserve respect.
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: Steve Irwin did wonderful conservation work but I was uncomfortable about some of his stunts. Even if animals aren't aware that you are not treating them with respect, the viewers are.

author: Daniel Barenboim

author: Talcott Parsons

quote: I respect people that are die-hard film people, but I started on video. I started on Hi8 video and mini-DV, and I made skate videos. So, I love film, and I love the way it looks, but I also love the way crappy video looks, or VHS. I've always been a fan of whatever the look is that's appropriate for what the feeling is.
author: Spike Jonze

quote: If guys don't respect themselves, they don't respect other people. That's times and personalities. And all of them are not that way. But it don't take but one or two to screw up the whole crowd.
author: Richard Petty

quote: You have to let individuals make their own choices and respect that, even if it's your own child. And that's what was taken away from me. My father passed away thinking I still had to go back to his way of believing.
author: Ayaan Hirsi Ali

quote: Getting respect from the opposition is a nice thing.
author: Harry Kane

quote: No one is above the game or the rules that govern it. Respect for the game and the people who participate in it will not be compromised.
author: Roger Goodell

quote: Our moral, religious, and political traditions are united in their respect for the dignity of human life.
author: Robert Casey

quote: And the greatest lesson that mom ever taught me though was this one. She told me there would be times in your life when you have to choose between being loved and being respected. Now she said to always pick being respected.
author: Chris Christie

quote: I played it right because that's what you're supposed to do - play it right and with respect.
author: Ryne Sandberg

quote: You need people who have their own views, whose views you respect, whom you can have a productive disagreement with, and work out ideas which you might not have come up with, or who improve on ideas you had.
author: Lee Hsien Loong

quote: I think almost every writer in the world would hope that books would be always talked about with respect and civility and depth and seriousness.
author: Dave Eggers

quote: I got into acting because my teachers kept nudging me into it. The power a teacher has to influence someone is so great. I can't think of a profession I have more respect for.
author: Jon Hamm

quote: We don't do drugs, drink or use profanity. Instead we instill morals and values in my boys by raising them with a love of God and a love and respect for themselves and all people. I believe they will have a chance.
author: Anita Baker

quote: You get respect when you give respect. That's how you get respect.
author: Michael Nutter

quote: Be modest, be respectful of others, try to understand.
author: Lakhdar Brahimi

quote: I have huge respect for Preet Bharara, a great U.S. Attorney by any measure. But even great men can make mistakes.
author: Jed S. Rakoff

quote: People want to hear what I have to say and respect what I say.
author: Jennifer Capriati

quote: Assuredly, Loving Souls, you should go to God with all humility and respect, humbling yourselves in His presence, especially when you remember your past ingratitude and sins.
author: Alphonsus Liguori

quote: Having spent many years working in New York's Chinatown restaurants early in my career, I have the utmost respect for the history and connection New Yorkers have with Chinese cuisine.
author: Andrew Cherng

quote: It's nice to know that people appreciate and respect you.
author: Marcel Carne

quote: When someone you have a lot of respect for believes in you, it helps you believe in yourself.
author: Cat Osterman
